page.title: 19WESTHOUGHTON SHOW
page.content: Each year in August Westhoughton holds a{Summer Show}which takes place over one weekend.The show is based in{ {Westhoughton Central Park}. On the first day there are many{ {side-shows}and{stalls,}and recently there has been a{Carnival Parade}on the following day.Many local organisations enter a float in this parade. There is usually a{Fair}operating for the duration of the show.This is very popular with the younger people. The proceeds from the summer show are shared among several{local {charities}and much of the event is { {sponsored}by local companies. The show features a number of { {displays}by various groups_Police Dogs,Morris Dancers,Folk-singers,etc. A{firework display}has provided a notable finale to the show!
